programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Grisly Discovery on the Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When body parts wash ashore in the Gulf Coast over several days in 2012, investigators must identify the victim before they can find the killers. Even then, justice is elusive.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Getting Schooled
programme.desc: Florence born Chef Simone Montali, Academic Supervisor of the CSCA sets out to school Executive Chef Anthony Haley of Antonios Bacari in Hyde Park with his Tuscan flavors. Will Chef Simone prevail or will Chef Anthony have his own lesson to teach?

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Driven to Kill: The Twisted Plot to Murder a Florida Doctor
programme.desc: In a serene community, a beloved doctor is bludgeoned in her own home. Investigators uncover a conspiracy that rocks the close-knit neighborhood to its core​​.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Family Drives Pittsburgh Athletes to Excel
programme.desc: From swimmers fueled by loved ones' unconditional support, to basketball and field hockey siblings driving each other toward greatness, see how family and sports are intertwined in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
programme.desc: As Girl Scouts at Camp Scott settle into their tents one evening, eerie footsteps and distant cries haunt the campers throughout the night. The unsettling sounds turn out to be the echos one of the largest murder investigations in Oklahoma's history.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Unique Therapies
programme.desc: These therapy methods might be outside the box, but are helping many

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Link in the Mardi Gras Murders
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Much is Dutch in Pella, IA
programme.desc: Put your best wooden clog forward and celebrate this small Iowa town's Dutch heritage. Take in the view from an authentic windmill. Check in to a bed and breakfast famous for its delicious "babies."

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Celebrating the Life and Legacy of a Local Superfan
programme.desc: After the passing of their good friend and local superfan, Roy Small, the team finds ways to carry on his legacy. See how they bring the community together to celebrate his life.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Cyber Queen Is Crushing it to Find Love Connection
programme.desc: Social butterfly, Metzli is ready for the next phase of her life when it comes to love. Will she grow with Matt, shake things up with Greg or harness a connection with David?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Mom Daughter Duo Drop Into the Wild
programme.desc: The mother-daughter dynamic duo of Cher and Sabria Delaine are best friends and do almost everything together except get out into nature. So Kinga meets up with ladies to mix things up and try to blend Cher’s island life with some southern comfort.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: Unbelievable Adventures
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to quiz people on the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Unbelievable Adventures," contestants answer questions for cash about a 700 lb. fish, a special cross-country trip and a woman taking on a bear.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque : B-Girl Adventures in Breakin’ and Brekkies
programme.desc: B-Girl Crystál Zamora joins Amanda for a classic breakfast with a New Mexican twist, break dance lessons with a challenge at the end, and an art studio that doesn’t just allow you to make a mess… but encourages it.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Midwest Holiday Delights to Make Seasons Bright
programme.desc: Celebrate some of the Midwest's holiday favorites. Where scotcheroos take center stage, snicker salads delight, and the pink stuff surprises the pallet.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: The Spark: Blind CrossFit Champion
programme.desc: Erica Powell will not be slowed down. After cancer treatments as an infant left her legally blind, she is fueled to become a world-class athlete and a beacon of inspiration to others.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Daring Escapes From Custody
programme.desc: A look at daring escapes from custody and the breakouts that take on many forms – yet always involve finding and exploiting the weakest parts of the system.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: New Dad Is Done Feeling Ashamed of His Smile
programme.desc: Danny’s a family man now and needs to upgrade his smile, damaged by past drug use. But he’s been burned by dentists before. Tattoo artist Craig claims that no one’s been able to give him teeth he won’t break. Will their faith in dentists be restored?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Meeting Mouth Ninja, The Paralyzed Artist, and Ghost Hunting
programme.desc: Justin and Ryan fly 3,000 miles to visit the “Mouth Ninja," a paralyzed artist who makes incredible drawings using only his mouth. Jimmy Luv and Davin lead the band in an epic ghost hunting adventure inside a haunted building.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Printmakers Under Pressure
programme.desc: Printmaking is showcased in Greenville as three young artists vie to take the creative crown. Artistry is put to the test as these makers carve, color and print over two days and four hours to create art-worthy new heights.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation: Iron + Resin
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh blacksmith, and an acrylic pour-artist in Boston.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Avoiding The Strike Zone
programme.desc: Ashley is young, fun and single in Louisville, but can’t seem to find the right guy – yet. Enter three local singles to show her the town with a trip to the batting cages, a game of tennis and a lesson in blowing glass.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.sub-title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Couples Committing Wild Crimes
programme.desc: A duo pulls a Bonnie and Clyde in a truck stolen from a dealership, and a pair takes money from a monastery. These shocking stories of couples in crime have to be witnessed to be believed.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Only In
programme.sub-title: Only In: Homemade CEOs, Recycle Bicycle & Pennsyltucky Whiskey in Harrisburg, PA
programme.desc: Where can you find young entrepreneurs, a nonprofit tune-up shop keeping the community safe and a distillery serving up the spirit of Central Pennsylvania? The same place where genius is grown and savory ice cream is a tradition.
